backText: Registration and attendance are 100% free, with meals, drinks, swag, & workshops included.
Any current high school student, grades 9–12.
If you’re under/over that age, contact us & we’ll see what we can do.

frontText: What if I’m new to coding?
backText: Complete beginners are not only welcome, but expected!
Learn as you go with our intro workshops & mentors.

frontText: What if I already know how to code?
backText: We welcome experts - let us know if you'd like to also volunteer to host a workshop.
Nope! You’ll have an opportunity to meet fellow hackers and make teams of up to 4—find some new friends, bring yours, or work alone.
Anything! A website, app, game, hardware, you name it. Judges will rate projects on creativity, technical skill demonstrated, polish, & utility.
Student ID, computer, chargers, anything for your hack (hardware?).

frontText: Who runs this? Is it supervised?
backText: We’re independently-organized by high schoolers, sponsored via an intl. non-profit called Hack Club. The event is fully supervised by teachers and other volunteer adults.
